snippet: A deal with Hasbro could feed DreamWorks’ need for growth and its push into toys and other merchandise while risking its focus and independence.
abstract: DreamWorks Animation seems poised to complete transformation that would feed its need for growth and its push into toys and other merchandise; reports of possible deal with Hasbro move DreamWorks shares up 14.1 percent in Nasdaq trading to close at $25.52 a share.

byline.original: By MICHAEL CIEPLY and BROOKS BARNES

lead_paragraph: A deal with Hasbro could feed DreamWorks’ need for growth and its push into toys and other merchandise while risking its focus and independence.

headline.main: Many Forces Are Pulling DreamWorks Animation in Diverse Directions
headline.print_headline: Many Forces Are Pulling DreamWorks Animation in Diverse Directions
